channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: prasanth_j can you review this? Small patch
don't we have a regex that parses delta_<minid>_<maxid>? if we can parse minid and maxid using regex then filter can return true right?

ATTACHMENT ID: 12919302 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Rebased the patch. I'm not aware of such a regex...

This is not really a regex, but a method that does something tangential to verifying if path is a base or a delta... moved the filter to AcidUtils and adjusted the delta part to be more consistent with part of the other method.

-1 overall
